metadata.description: Curated agent library with 32 production-focused plugins for personal development workflow - tightly controlled fork of wshobson/agents

plugins.name: code-documentation
plugins.description: Documentation generation, code explanation, and technical writing with automated doc generation and tutorial creation

plugins.name: debugging-toolkit
plugins.description: Interactive debugging, developer experience optimization, and smart debugging workflows

plugins.name: git-pr-workflows
plugins.description: Git workflow automation, pull request enhancement, and team onboarding processes

plugins.name: error-debugging
plugins.description: Error analysis, trace debugging, and multi-agent problem diagnosis

plugins.name: agent-orchestration
plugins.description: Multi-agent system optimization, agent improvement workflows, and context management

plugins.name: machine-learning-ops
plugins.description: ML model training pipelines, hyperparameter tuning, model deployment automation, experiment tracking, and MLOps workflows

plugins.name: data-engineering
plugins.description: ETL pipeline construction, data warehouse design, batch processing workflows, and data-driven feature development

plugins.name: incident-response
plugins.description: Production incident management, triage workflows, and automated incident resolution

plugins.name: error-diagnostics
plugins.description: Error tracing, root cause analysis, and smart debugging for production systems

plugins.name: observability-monitoring
plugins.description: Metrics collection, logging infrastructure, distributed tracing, SLO implementation, and monitoring dashboards

plugins.name: deployment-strategies
plugins.description: Deployment patterns, rollback automation, and infrastructure templates

plugins.name: deployment-validation
plugins.description: Pre-deployment checks, configuration validation, and deployment readiness assessment

plugins.name: kubernetes-operations
plugins.description: Kubernetes manifest generation, networking configuration, security policies, observability setup, GitOps workflows, and auto-scaling

plugins.name: cloud-infrastructure
plugins.description: Cloud architecture design for AWS/Azure/GCP, Kubernetes cluster configuration, Terraform infrastructure-as-code, hybrid cloud networking, and multi-cloud cost optimization

plugins.name: cicd-automation
plugins.description: CI/CD pipeline configuration, GitHub Actions/GitLab CI workflow setup, and automated deployment pipeline orchestration

plugins.name: database-cloud-optimization
plugins.description: Database query optimization, cloud cost optimization, and scalability improvements

plugins.name: database-design
plugins.description: Database architecture, schema design, and SQL optimization for production systems

plugins.name: api-testing-observability
plugins.description: API testing automation, request mocking, OpenAPI documentation generation, observability setup, and monitoring

plugins.name: seo-content-creation
plugins.description: SEO content writing, planning, and quality auditing with E-E-A-T optimization

plugins.name: seo-technical-optimization
plugins.description: Technical SEO optimization including meta tags, keywords, structure, and featured snippets

plugins.name: seo-analysis-monitoring
plugins.description: Content freshness analysis, cannibalization detection, and authority building for SEO

plugins.name: documentation-generation
plugins.description: OpenAPI specification generation, Mermaid diagram creation, tutorial writing, API reference documentation

plugins.name: c4-architecture
plugins.description: Comprehensive C4 architecture documentation workflow with bottom-up code analysis, component synthesis, container mapping, and context diagram generation

plugins.name: business-analytics
plugins.description: Business metrics analysis, KPI tracking, financial reporting, and data-driven decision making

plugins.name: hr-legal-compliance
plugins.description: HR policy documentation, legal compliance templates (GDPR/SOC2/HIPAA), employment contracts, and regulatory documentation

plugins.name: customer-sales-automation
plugins.description: Customer support workflow automation, sales pipeline management, email campaigns, and CRM integration

plugins.name: content-marketing
plugins.description: Content marketing strategy, web research, and information synthesis for marketing operations

plugins.name: quantitative-trading
plugins.description: Quantitative analysis, algorithmic trading strategies, financial modeling, portfolio risk management, and backtesting

plugins.name: shell-scripting
plugins.description: Production-grade Bash scripting with defensive programming, POSIX compliance, and comprehensive testing

plugins.name: developer-essentials
plugins.description: Essential developer skills including Git workflows, SQL optimization, error handling, code review, E2E testing, authentication, debugging, and monorepo management

plugins.name: conductor
plugins.description: Context-Driven Development plugin that transforms Claude Code into a project management tool with structured workflow: Context → Spec & Plan → Implement

plugins.name: agent-teams
plugins.description: Orchestrate multi-agent teams for parallel code review, hypothesis-driven debugging, and coordinated feature development using Claude Code's Agent Teams
